problem.markdown:
Assume we are trying to find a number in a sorted list of numbers. Which of the following is an efficient algorithm to accomplish this? ( ) Compare our number to each item in the list ( ) Use binary search recursivly to compare our number to the middle number of the list (x) All of the above ( ) None of the above
[explanation] Both of these methods are efficient, even though the second choice is the more optimal solution since it is faster. [explanation]
